translations: v.封锁，包围（某地）（blockade 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: The Army boys had personnel carriers blockading the cross streets.
sentences.translation: 士兵们用运兵车封堵了与主道交叉的道路。

sentences.sentence: Objective: to observe the expression of GATA-3in asthmatic mice lungs and to explore the feasibility of interleukin (IL-12) blockading GATA-3expression in treatment of bronchial asthma.
sentences.translation: 目的观察t细胞特异转录因子gata - 3在支气管哮喘(哮喘)小鼠肺部的表达，探讨应用白细胞介素12 (IL - 12)阻断GATA - 3表达治疗支气管哮喘的可能性。
